page.title: 05Wimborne Minster.
page.content: The main tourist attraction for the town of Wimborne is the Minster itself which is very old. Parts of it are Norman. We went by coach from school to see the Minster. First of all we saw the Astronomical Clock. The clock still tells the time by the sun. I liked the Ettricke tomb which is in an unusual place in the wall. We saw some beautiful windows. The west window has twelve saints.We were lucky to go up in the chained library to see some very old books chained up. We saw the lectern in the shape of an eagle. It had the Bible on it. The only brass in the church was of King Ethelred, brother of King Alfred. The Minster was crowded with visitors. As we came out,we heard the quarterjack strike the hour. JOHANNE STEVENS AGED 9 YEARS.
